svg.text: ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ CONFIDENCE INTERVAL │ ├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ │ │ A 95% confidence interval means: │ │ │ │ andquot;If we repeated this experiment many times, 95% of the │ │ calculated intervals would contain the true parameterandquot; │ │ │ │ It does NOT mean: │ │ andquot;There's a 95% probability the true value is in this │ │ specific intervalandquot; (Bayesian interpretation) │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
